md:
giải nghĩa từ "historical" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Historical (adjective)
	+ Meaning: Relating to the past; concerned with the study of the past.
	+ Vietnamese: Lịch sử
	+ Example sentence: The historical novel is based on real events.
	+ Related words: history, historic, past, ancient
	+ Antonyms: modern, contemporary

* Historical (noun)
	+ Meaning: A person who studies or writes about history.
	+ Vietnamese: Nhà sử học
	+ Example sentence: The historical is an expert in ancient civilizations.
	+ Related words: historian, history, research, scholar
	+ Antonyms: none

Note: The adjective "historical" is more commonly used than the noun "historical".
html:

  • Historical (adjective)

    • Antonyms: modern, contemporary

  • Historical (noun)

    • Vietnamese: Nhà sử học
    • Example sentence: The historical is an expert in ancient civilizations.

Note: The adjective "historical" is more commonly used than the noun "historical".
